text: Lunamarine (punarnavine) is a quinolone alkaloid present in Boerhavia diffusa (punarnava). The compound has shown some in vitro anticancer, antiestrogenic, immunomodulatory, and anti-amoebic activity (particularly against Entamoeba histolytica). == References == Category:4-Quinolones Category:Alkaloids Category:Benzodioxoles Category:Phenol ethers
title: Lunamarine
